name: Gather Quest GGJ 2023
description:
Project made for GGJ 2023!  The theme, "Roots" made me think about gathering, so I made a game where you collect mushrooms by exploring a randomly generated environment.  I would have had the player collect actual roots, but I decided that would be harder to show.  I probably should have added some carrots and radishes.

I haven't had any success with the webgl build for this project.  If it won't load for you, try downloading one of the build files.
